Dialogue.Statement: Hello, you look new here. What brought you to this place?

Answers.Response: Someone stole something from me. I followed them and I stumbled upon this place
Someone stole something from me. I chased them here...
My village was destroyed, wandering around, I stumbled upon this place. BTW have you seen a tiny square darting about the place?

Dialogue.Statement: Sorry to hear that. If you ask Bob over there. He should know something about it

Answers.Response: I'll go ask him. But what is this place?
So these things happen a lot around here?

Dialogue.Statement: Just a little hellhole of a place. People staying here have lost it. Fights are 2 a penny

Answers.Response: I'll be taking my leave and go find Bob as you said
I'll be going now. But how can I trust you?
I don't like the way you are describing this place...

Dialogue.Statement: Not too often. Once in a while someone stumbles in. I've talked enough let me get back to what I was doing
Well you'll just have to take my word for it. The way I see it there's no-one you can ask isn't it

Answers.Answer: I guess that leaves me with no choice... I'll be leaving now...
I'll have to decide for myself...
I don't like the way you are talking...

Dialogue.Statement: You just turned the tables. I'm getting irritated by your talk. Get out before I too loose it
Would you sit down and listen to a story from this old man...

Answers.Answer: No I don't have the patience to listen to you...
Don't you have anything else to do? Well let's here it anyway...

Dialogue.Statement: You people don't know how to take things so slow. Let's see how good you are at defending yourself
Ok. Here goes... Why did the chicken cross the road?

Answers.Answer: To get to the other side
Chickens at rest tend to stay at rest. Chickens in motion tend to cross the road

Dialogue.Statement: Haha... Wisely chosen. You made my day.
That's a weird answer. Anyway it was amusing. Have a good day

Answers.Answer: You might think it was amusing but I don't have anytime for this
Have a good day... But you just wasted time...
